Name: teleradarr
Overview: This is a 100% inline bot, you can't talk directly to him, you need to add your bot to your telegram and in any chat you type this:

radarr_profile_id.Name: RADARR_PROFILE_ID
radarr_profile_id.Description: Put here your profile id from radarr (1 = any, by default)

radarr_api_key.Name: RADARR_API_KEY
radarr_api_key.Description: Radarr WebUI -> Settings -> General -> API Key

telegram_bot_token.Name: TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN
telegram_bot_token.Default: Enable /setinline and /setinlinefeedback when creating your bot

radarr_custom_path.Name: RADARR_CUSTOM_PATH
radarr_custom_path.Description: (Optional) If you has some URL Base set on unraid like ip:port/radarr -> put /radarr on the field above

radarr_custom_folder.Name: RADARR_CUSTOM_FOLDER
radarr_custom_folder.Description: (Optional) Radarr folder you use for saving movies
